Sentencas: Reactive magnetron sputtering has been used for deposition of yttria-stabilized ZrO2 (YSZ) and gadolinium-doped CeO2 (CGO) layers on NiO-YSZ commercial anodes for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Magnetron-Sputtered YSZ and CGO Electrolytes for SOFC

Sentencas: To increase the deposition rate and improve the quality of the sputtered thin oxide films, asymmetric bipolar pulse magnetron sputtering was applied.
Titulo: Magnetron-Sputtered YSZ and CGO Electrolytes for SOFC

Sentencas: Three types of anode-supported cells, with single-layer YSZ or CGO and YSZ/CGO bilayer electrolyte, were prepared and investigated.
Titulo: Magnetron-Sputtered YSZ and CGO Electrolytes for SOFC

Sentencas: Optimal thickness of oxide layers was determined experimentally.
Titulo: Magnetron-Sputtered YSZ and CGO Electrolytes for SOFC

Sentencas: Based on the electrochemical characteristics of the cells, it is shown that, at lower operating temperatures of 650 degrees C to 700 degrees C, the cells with single-layer CGO electrolyte are most effective.
Titulo: Magnetron-Sputtered YSZ and CGO Electrolytes for SOFC

Sentencas: The power density of these fuel cells exceeds that of the cell based on YSZ single-layer electrolyte at the same temperature.
Titulo: Magnetron-Sputtered YSZ and CGO Electrolytes for SOFC

Sentencas: Power densities of 650 mW cm(-2) and 500 mW cm(-2) at 700 degrees C were demonstrated by cells with single-layer YSZ and CGO electrolyte, respectively.
Titulo: Magnetron-Sputtered YSZ and CGO Electrolytes for SOFC

Sentencas: Significantly enhanced maximum power density was achieved in a bilayer-electrolyte single cell, as compared with cells with a single electrolyte layer.
Titulo: Magnetron-Sputtered YSZ and CGO Electrolytes for SOFC

Sentencas: Maximum power density of 1.25 W cm(-2) at 800 degrees C and 1 W cm(-2) at 750 degrees C under voltage of 0.7 V were achieved for the YSZ/CGO bilayer electrolyte cell with YSZ and CGO thickness of about 4 mu m and 1.5 mu m, respectively.
Titulo: Magnetron-Sputtered YSZ and CGO Electrolytes for SOFC

Sentencas: This signifies that the YSZ thin film serves as a blocking layer to prevent electrical current leakage in the CGO layer, leading to the overall enhanced performance.
Titulo: Magnetron-Sputtered YSZ and CGO Electrolytes for SOFC

Sentencas: This performance is comparable to the state of the art for cells based on YSZ/CGO bilayer electrolyte.
Titulo: Magnetron-Sputtered YSZ and CGO Electrolytes for SOFC
